item.description:
In June we will be having a guest speaker:


“I’ll Stop Procrastinating…Someday”

What makes us put off until tomorrow what we should have done last week? Is it fear of failure, overwhelm, busyness or maybe it’s just not that important to you – Or is it?

It’s possible that procrastination is your call to action! When you DO the stuff you are putting off, you may see yourself and your abilities from a whole new perspective!

Don’t delay! Come to this fun and inspiring workshop to learn a few simple strategies for shattering old beliefs and gaining new insight!


Diane Ladd, ADHD Coach

Diane is a coach with a passion for helping people “get it all together”— and then remember where they put it! She is an intuitive coach who trusts her gut instincts while coaching and teaching. She is the founder of ADD to Life Coaching and comes to coaching with a rich and diverse background. She is a Personal Fitness Trainer who has worked in the industry for over 15 years motivating her clients to take action today and live life the way they want!
item.name: June Procrastinator's Meeting
